Detailed Description

cvmx_npei_ctl_status

NPEI_CTL_STATUS = NPEI Control Status Register

Contains control and status for NPEI. Writes to this register are not oSrdered with writes/reads to the PCIe Memory space. To ensure that a write has completed the user must read the register before making an access(i.e. PCIe memory space) that requires the value of this register to be updated.
